pullRequest.body:
This PR adds a `CommRing` instance for `BitVec w`. The theorems `ofFin_ofNat`, `toFin_inj`, `toFin_zero`, `toFin_one`, and `ofInt_negSucc_eq_not_ofNat` have been merged to lean and will be available in the next lean update: https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/5680.

Contributed-by: Alex Keizer <alex@keizer.dev>

nodes.body:
### PR summary [48c5f3eeec](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/17700/commits/48c5f3eeec56c212c46f7402bf940fbae9e47e93)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ instance : CommRing (BitVec w)`
`+ ofFin_intCast`
`+ ofFin_natCast`
`+ ofFin_neg`
`+ ofFin_ofNat`
`+ ofInt_negSucc`
`+ toFin_inj`
`+ toFin_intCast`
`+ toFin_natCast`
`+ toFin_one`
`+ toFin_zero`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
I am closing this for now to not create unnecessary merge conflicts. Thank you all for the comments.

```suggestion
theorem ofFin_intCast (z : ℤ) : ofFin (z : Fin (2^w)) = ↑z := by
```

pullRequest.title: feat: add CommRing (BitVec w)
